Reference

Package

midfieldr

Undergraduate Student Records for Longitudinal Research

Data

case_stickiness

Stickiness case data

cip

Classification of Instructional Programs (CIP) data

bio_sci

CIP codes for biological and biomedical sciences

engr

CIP codes for engineering

math_stat

CIP codes for mathematics and statistics

other_stem

CIP codes for other STEM

phys_sci

CIP codes for physical sciences

stem

CIP codes for all STEM

rcb_colors

Named colors from the ColorBrewer palettes

Analysis

cip_filter()

Filter CIP data

gather_ever()

Gather students ever enrolled in a program

gather_grad()

Gather program graduates

race_sex_join()

Join student demographics to a data frame

tally_stickiness()

Computes stickiness

zero_fill()

Insert a count of zero for missing combinations of categorical variables.

Graph helpers

expon_scale_x_log10() midfield_theme()

Graphics utility functions

rcb()

Hex color codes from RColorBrewer
